text: The Pan-Armenian Games are a sports event where people from the Armenian diaspora and Armenia compete against each other. It includes different sports competitions for both individuals and teams. The games happen in Yerevan, which is the capital of Armenia. The games are open to people who have an Armenian passport or are citizens of other countries with Armenian ancestry. Spouses of people with Armenian ancestry can also participate. ==References== Category:Multi-sport events Category:Festivals in Armenia
title: Pan-Armenian Games
